channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NM
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NM

item.title: Report E-2023090007
item.description:
Report E-2023090007

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-11T03:12:58+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-04
  • City: ALBUQUERQUE
  • State: NM
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading it was discovered that the load had shifted during transit and that one of the metal 55 gallon drum of resin (un1866) had been damaged by a sharp object and had released 3 gallons of product. Contractors were dispatched for the containment and cleanup of the release.
